info.description: This is the API documentation for Base Framework
info.title: Base Framework API

post.description: Checks if a user has permission to perform an action on a resource

get.description: Get all permissions in the system
Get all roles in the system

post.description: Creates a new role with the provided information

get.description: Retrieves a specific role by its Id

put.description: Updates an existing role with the provided information

delete.description: Deletes a role by its Id

get.description: Retrieves all permissions associated with a specific role

put.description: Replaces all permissions for a role with the provided list
put.summary: Update all permissions for a role

parameters.description: List of permission IDs to assign
parameters.name: permissions

post.description: Assigns a permission to a role

delete.description: Removes a permission from a role

get.description: Get all available achievements for a game

post.description: Unlock a specific achievement for the authenticated user

get.description: Get the top players leaderboard for a game

parameters.description: Number of top players to return
parameters.name: limit

get.description: Get complete player profile with stats, achievements, and progress
Get the current game progress for the authenticated user

post.description: Save the game progress for the authenticated user

get.description: Get the player stats for the authenticated user

post.description: Update the player stats for the authenticated user

get.description: Get a paginated list of media items

post.description: Create a new media item with optional file upload

get.description: Get an unpaginated list of all media items
Get a media item by Id

put.description: Update a media item's details and optionally its file

delete.description: Delete a media item and its associated file

put.description: Update the file attached to a media item

delete.description: Remove the file attached to a media item

post.description: Handle the OAuth callback from Apple
Handle the OAuth callback from Facebook
Handle the OAuth callback from Google

get.description: Get profile by Bearer Token
get.summary: Get profile from Authenticated User Token

put.summary: Update profile from Authenticated User Token

put.description: Update profile avatar by Bearer Token
put.summary: Update profile avatar from Authenticated User Token

put.description: Update profile password by Bearer Token
put.summary: Update profile password from Authenticated User Token

get.description: Returns a list of all registered tasks
Get a paginated list of translations with optional filtering

post.description: Update multiple translations for a model at once

get.description: Get a single translation by its ID
Get a list of all languages that have translations in the system
Get all translations for a specific model and model ID
Get translations for a specific model, model ID, and language
get.summary: Get translations for model and language

get.description: Establishes a WebSocket connection, check example at: /static/chat.html

resource_id.description: Optional: specific resource Id if applicable

role_id.description: Optional: role Id for role-based permissions

user_id.description: Optional: specific user Id if applicable

valid.description: Valid is true if Time is not NULL

BearerAuth.description: Enter your token with the prefix "Bearer "
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
